description: The skibotn Crew Neck is a quick drying and durable crew neck for enduro style mountain biking. It has the look and appearance of a classic crew sweater but offers functional features customized for biking. The long-lasting wool/recycled polyester/elastane mix provides great temperature regulation, quick-drying properties, ?exibility for optimal comfort. You can easily store stuff, snacks and a water bottle in one of the two zippered lower back pockets. The articulated elbows are reinforced with patched for extra durability and it has stretchy cuffs with thumb holes.
name: Norrona Skibotn Crew Neck - Mens
